messages.subject: Re: no mail
messages.msgSnippet: You might need to delete some old mail in you re mailbox..... Linda in SC ... problem with bouncing mail through yahoo groups. I have since straightened it
messages.messageBody:
You might need to delete some old mail in you're mailbox.....
Linda in SC

--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "Johanna" <saninocencio1@c...> wrote:
> Help anyone out there with technical knowledge of email. I had a
problem with bouncing mail through yahoo groups. I have since
straightened it out. When I did, i started receiving email from
groups again. now for two days I have received no mail from any of my
Yahoo groups. When I go to the website, I am listed as a member and
can access the archives. i can even post a message from here an the
group will receive it. I just am not getting any postings to my email
address. I emailed yohoo help but have not heard back yet. Any
suggestions? If you reply please send to my personal account, because
I am not getting the group mail the address is saninocencio1@c...
> Thanks so much
>
> Johanna
> Life is the ultimate learning experience!
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: no mail
messages.msgSnippet: Help anyone out there with technical knowledge of email. I had a problem with bouncing mail through yahoo groups. I have since straightened it out. When I did,
messages.messageBody:
Help anyone out there with technical knowledge of email. I had a problem with bouncing mail through yahoo groups. I have since straightened it out. When I did, i started receiving email from groups again. now for two days I have received no mail from any of my Yahoo groups. When I go to the website, I am listed as a member and can access the archives. i can even post a message from here an the group will receive it. I just am not getting any postings to my email address. I emailed yohoo help but have not heard back yet. Any suggestions? If you reply please send to my personal account, because I am not getting the group mail the address is saninocencio1@...
Thanks so much

Johanna
Life is the ultimate learning experience!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] no mail
messages.msgSnippet: Are we still having server problems? I received no mail at all yesterday. Johanna  Life is the ultimate learning experience!   I had very little mail
messages.messageBody:
Are we still having server problems? I received no mail
at all yesterday.
Johanna 
Life is the ultimate learning experience!


I had very little mail yesterday, it's all here today
though :-) It might be yahoo ironing out the AOL
thingy or it might be ageneral slowdown cos of that
virus that's about atm, I had a few copies sent and it
was 260k so it took ages for them to download :-( If
it's gone out to loads of folk and about 20 copies each
then I can see how that would gum up the works.
Anyway, it seems back to 'normal' now :-)

Tracy
